events.FinishRoundProcedureEvent: Early completion of bids acceptance by the customer
events.FinishRoundProcedureOrgEvent: Early completion of bids acceptance by the customer
events.NoProposal24Event: Bids were not submitted to the tender 24 hours before the end of the bid acceptance
events.NotifyCompaniesByProcedureTags: Published request with tags matching the tags of my company profile
events.NotifyProcedureFinishedWithOrderOrg: The owner completed the tender with selection of the winners
events.NotifyProcedureFinishedWithoutOrderOrg: The owner completed the tender without selection of the winners
events.ParticipantsLeaveProcedure: The vendor has declined to submit a bid to the request
events.ProcedureChanged: Changes have been made to the tender
events.ProcedureChangedOrg: Changes have been made to the tender
events.ProcedureDigestReadyEvent: New requests corresponding to the profile of my company (digest per day)
events.ProposalChangedEvent: The vendor has updated the previously submitted bid
events.RemindCompleteProfileNotification: Receive notifications to completely fill the profile.
events.SummingUpProcedureReminderEvent: 48 hours before the end of accepting bids
events.SummingUpProcedureOrgEvent: Acceptance of bids is completed, the request has moved to the stage of final summary
events.SummingUpProcedureEvent: Acceptance of bids is completed, the request has moved to the stage of final summary

groups.BuyerActions: Actions of team members, changing the status of the tenders
groups.ParticipantNotifications: Notifications for purchases in which my company is involved

content.notice: Receive notifications of important events via mail:

Chats.name: Chats

Purchases.name: Requests

Sales.name: Bids
Sales.notice: Notifications for tenders where you are a vendor.
